fileName: Amazon Kiro_ Vibe Coding IDE with Claude 4 Sonnet.wav

metadata.title: Amazon's new Kiro IDE
metadata.description: Amazon's new Kiro IDE, an AI-powered integrated development environment specifically designed to support "vibe coding." This platform aims to streamline the transition of prototype applications into production environments by incorporating features like spec-driven development and hooks, which introduce structure to the often informal "vibe coding" process.
metadata.creator: Podcast

episodeDescription: Amazon's new Kiro IDE, an AI-powered integrated development environment specifically designed to support "vibe coding." This platform aims to streamline the transition of prototype applications into production environments by incorporating features like spec-driven development and hooks, which introduce structure to the often informal "vibe coding" process.
